title: Which well-known producers use FL Studio as their main DAW? - Quora

response.answer_text: Avicci was a flstudio power user before his death, deadmau5, bass Hunter and even cangellus have been known to use flstudio, deadmau5 us virtually an ambassador for the software… if you go to the flstudio website, (imageline.com) then there's a power user page featuring famous producers and artists who use flstudio as their main daw
